snippet: Venus Williams survived a three-set match in the opening round of the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio, but Andy Roddick lost in two sets to a player who was a last-minute injury replacement.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats Maria Kirilenko in the opening round of the Western & Southern Open tennis tournament; Jeremy Chardy defeats Andy Roddick in the men's tournament.
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams survived a three-set match in the opening round of the Western & Southern Open in Mason, Ohio, but Andy Roddick lost in two sets to a player who was a last-minute injury replacement.

headline.main: Venus Williams Wins in 3 Sets; Injury Replacement Tops Roddick
headline.print_headline: Venus Williams Wins in 3 Sets; Injury Replacement Tops Roddick
